answers.answer: I hope not! I have gestational diabetes and I drink a lot of unsweetened raspberry tea.
I tried that with my first pregnancy and it didn't work.
I was gonna try it and see if it works.
No...it does not.  It suppose to gradually help you uterus contract better so when the time comes you should theoretically have an easier labor.
I thought it was to strengthen your uterus, and help with morning sickness....
It helps to strengthen the uterus...

Not regular raspberry tea it has to be the raspberry leaf tea...there is a difference. If you are drinking flavored raspberry tea its probly artificially flavored anyway. From what I read it helps to strengthen your uteris and helps to shorten labor. It shouldn't make you dilate early or go into labor though.
I heard foot rub my friend had one and hour later she was in labor
ive used it with my last 3 pregnancy from 34 weeks all 3 were on time & 4 hour labours :-) im taking it this time also & im due on monday! Im hoping im gunna have the same result this time! Lol

question: Drinking raspberry tea help thin out your cervix and dilate?
title: Is it true?
